Title: Gotham Men's Gold-Tone Swiss Quartz Date Movement Pocket Watch # GWC14044GA
Description: Gotham Men's Gold-Tone Swiss Quartz Date Movement Pocket Watch # GWC14044GA FEATURES Antique reproduction style oval gold-tone covered pocket watch with intricate detailing and built in stand Rich textured white dial with gold-tone applied Arabic numbers Precision Swiss quartz date movement plus scratch resistant mineral crystal Includes matching 15" curb pocket watch chain with spring ring attachment Arrives with deluxe draw string pouch and gift box, Selvyt polishing cloth, operating instructions and lifetime limited warranty card DESCRIPTION This classic and elegant gold-tone pocket watch from Gotham is the perfect addition to anyone's timepiece collection. Features include a regal oval shaped case with intricately designed front and back etchings, precision Swiss date movement, white dial with gold-tone Arabic numerals, gold-tone classic hands, scratch resistant mineral crystal and a matching 15" curb chain with spring ring attachment. In addition, the back cover of this timepiece opens into a stand so that you can display you watch on your desk or nightstand. As always, your watch will arrive beautifully gift packaged with operating instructions, lifetime limited warranty and a Selvyt polishing cloth to keep your timepiece clean.
